artist: Etcher: Anthony de Marcenay de Ghuy; Artist: After Nicolas Poussin
description: dying man on bed; doctor standing next to bed, hand on chest of man; man seated on bed writing; two women at foot of bed, weeping
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [N. Poussin Pt.     A. de Marcenay de Ghuy, P.. et Sculpt.. No. 15(?)/ TESTAMENT D\'EUDAMEDAS]; lengthy text in French below and a shield in center of text; below text in pencil: [2-231]
title: Testament d' Eudamedas
